        Your task:

img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely a collectible or upgrade material. Based on the context, it fits within a list of rare materials used for enhancing gameplay elements such as stats, spirits, or equipment. The preceding and following text suggests it may belong to the category of rare upgrade materials, similar to items like "Blood of the Iron Bull" or "Awaken Wine Worm," which are obtained through exploration, defeating enemies, or opening chests.
